com.eurosonic.eurosonicut

Interface IEurosonicUTADSettings


  • public interface IEurosonicUTADSettings
    Interface to control ultrasonic Analog/Digital unit

    • Method Detail

      • setAveraging

        void setAveraging(short ch,
                int nbAverage)
        Setup Ascan averaging
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        nbAverage - possible values : 1(default),2,4,8,16

      • setCompression

        void setCompression(short ch,
                  int mode,
                  int factor)
        Setup Ascan compression
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        mode - compression type : - 0 : no compression (default) - 1 : envelop
        factor - of compression 1 to 255

      • setDelay

        void setDelay(short ch,
            float delay)
        Setup Ascan delay
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        delay - Ascan delay in µs

      • setDigitizer

        void setDigitizer(short ch,
                int digitizer)
        Setup the sampling rate of Ascan signal.
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        digitizer - Sampling frequency : - 0 : 100MHz (default) - 1 : 50 MHz - 2 : 25 MHz

      • setFilter

        void setFilter(short ch,
             int filter)
        Setup Ascan filter
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        filter - filter type : - 0 : none (default) - 1 : 2.5MHz - 2 : 5MHz - 3 : 10MHz - 4 : User defined
        See Also:
        for set up user defined mode

      • setFilterUserDefined

        void setFilterUserDefined(short ch,
                        short[] coefficients)
        Setup user defined filter
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        coefficients - FIR coefficients, size of list must be equal 16
        See Also:
        for set up user defined mode

      • setGain

        void setGain(short ch,
           float gain)
        Setup Ascan gain
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        gain - Ascan gain dB

      • setPrecision

        void setPrecision(short ch,
                int precision)
        Setup Ascan amplitude precision
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        precision - Bit quantification - 0 : 12 bits (default) - 1 : 8 bits

      • setTGCActivation

        void setTGCActivation(short ch,
                    boolean value)
        Setup TGC activation (Time Gain Correction)
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        value - activation
        See Also:
        to set TGC table, to set trend

      • setTGCTable

        void setTGCTable(short ch,
               float[] gain,
               float[] time)
        Setup TGC table (Time Gain Correction), gain and time table size must be equal.
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        gain - table (dB)
        time - table (µs)
        See Also:
        to set TGC activation, to set trend

      • setTGCTrend

        void setTGCTrend(short ch,
               int trend)
        Seup TGC trend
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        trend - table : - 0 : no smooth (default) - 1 : smooth (linear interpolation)

      • setWidth

        void setWidth(short ch,
            float width)
        Setup Ascan width
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        width - Ascan width µs
